comments.name: lisa_simpson
comments.comment: Mom, romance is dead. It was acquired in a hostile takeover by Hallmark and Disney, homogenized, and sold off piece by piece.

comments.name: homer_simpson
comments.comment: Oh, so they have internet on computers now!

comments.name: marge_simpson
comments.comment: Wow, your first day at the new school! Lisa, have fun. Bart, don't!
